document.full_text: the ncaa on thursday rejected southern california's appeal to reduce sanctions imposed on its storied football program, keeping in place some of the harshest penalties leveled against a school in a quarter-century.
document.title: ncaa rejects usc's appeal of football sanctions
lines_and_colors: the ncaa on thursday rejected southern california's appeal to reduce sanctions imposed on its storied football program, keeping in place some of the harshest penalties leveled against a school in a quarter-century.
